column2: "Yes, I received the report. There is no delay in your application for the search permit. I expect great things from you."
"At least, that's what the ARKS Code Reporting Section says I should say. Now, I'm going to go off the record here."
"Not many ARKS members have been permitted to explore the Ruins. We know almost nothing about them."
"Frankly, I have no idea what you'll find there. But the few reports we've received say it's an extremely dangerous place."
"Please be careful. We'd hate to lose you after all your hard work."
